name: No Looking Back (NoLookingBack)
description:
Description

A 2D Puzzle, platformer built with the Unity Engine for PC as a School project

Story

You are a scientist in search of an ancient alien artifact that is said to be the last piece of artifact that you need for a project you are working on. As you venture through an old abandoned space station that is said to contain the artifact, you are  lost and trapped. Are you able to obtain this artifact and find your way out? Solve puzzles and beat levels to reach your objective (goal). Use the environment to your advantage. 

Features

- Players are able to interact with boxes by pushing or pulling them 

- Buttons are provided throughout the map. Interacting with these grants players certain outcomes. For example (spawn box, platform, objective, etc)

- Simple character controls

- Fun and challenging levels

Vision/Mission

To make the game simple, but as challenging and fun as possible.

Release Date/Platform

November 3, 2020 / On the PC

Developer

Nathanael Julian

An oversea international student, currently studying game design at Media Design School, Auckland, New Zealand
